Environment.CrewMemberTypes

Class Scientist

  • java.lang.Object
    • Environment.CrewMemberTypes.CrewMember
      • Environment.CrewMemberTypes.Scientist

  • public class Scientist
extends CrewMember
    Scientists have a higher chance at finding spare parts on foreign planets.
    Author:
    Benjamin Thurber, Blake Kayser
